body: Noo. Mangaka-san should have made Yanmama II, not TomoKano Kaa-chan II. Damn it. The chances of Yanmama II happening are now extremely low. F
The author is too focused on the story and sex scene that he forgot to put the mole on her boobs..
This is a part 2? What happened to the mole on her boobs? It just vanished? Come on, dude at least establish a continuity! I can't fap to this!
It now had part two but both didn't have any English translation yet

I personally have no issue with this cause, if it wasnt for the fact it is ntr it would be no different from any other friends mother story. That being said cant say I like the friend acting jealous, the while secrecy thing, or the fact that they gave the son a small dick for no damn reason but, otherwise I support this ntr more then the standard.
What did he expected? He rejected her xD
This hurts so muxh, luckily the art is mild
